Package org.gicentre.utils

General utilities for use with Processing

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FrameTimer
    Class for displaying frame rates in a sketch.
    Version
    Stores version information about the giCentre utilities package.

Package org.gicentre.utils Description

General utilities for use with Processing

This package includes general utilities that are not specifically associated with one of the other sub-packages.

To check you have the latest version of the gicentreUtils package, display the results of Version.getText() or Version.getVersion(). It should match that shown in this API documentation.

Related Documentation

  • Processing home page
  • giCentreUtils source code
  • giCentre.org home page
Version 3.4, 5th February, 2016
